sense.def:
Kadar jajce
hatches
ali kadar ptica, žuželka ali kaka druga žival
hatches
ali
is hatched
, jajčna lupina poči in iz nje pride mladič.

seg.quote: The larva hatches out and lives in the soil.
After ten days, the eggs hatch.

sense.def:
To hatch a plot or scheme
pomeni načrtovati zaplet ali zaroto.

seg.quote: I've heard about the grand plot that you two gentlemen are hatching.

sense.def:
A hatch
je majhna, pokrita odprtina v podu, zidu ali stropu.
